results.headline: Le laboratoire Tamarinier du MARNDR pillé, des appareils dangereux pour la santé emportés
results.description: A laboratory under the Ministry of Agriculture has been robbed, leading to the theft of potentially dangerous health equipment, raising concerns about public safety.

results.headline: Scandale BNC : ECC salue la transmission du rapport de l’ULCC à la justice
results.description: The Economic Crime Commission (ECC) praised the submission of a report by the Anti-Corruption Unit (ULCC) to the judicial authorities regarding corruption allegations within the National Credit Bank (BNC).

results.headline: Cayes : deux morts dans le crash d’un avion privé
results.description: A private plane crash in the Cayes region has resulted in two fatalities, highlighting ongoing concerns related to aviation safety in Haiti.

results.headline: La République dominicaine va expulser 10.000 Haïtiens sans-papiers par semaine
results.description: The Dominican Republic has announced a plan to deport 10,000 undocumented Haitians weekly, leading to heightened tensions within the Haitian community.

results.headline: L’ULCC recommande la mise en mouvement de l'action publique contre les membres du CPT pour corruption passive
results.description: The ULCC has recommended legal action against three members of the Presidential Transition Council (CPT) for passive corruption, further complicating Haiti's political landscape.

results.headline: Décès de Marie Carmelle Lafontant, pionnière de la lutte féministe en Haïti
results.description: The death of feminist icon Marie Carmelle Lafontant at 94 years old has been announced, marking a significant loss for the advocacy of women's rights in Haiti.

results.headline: La faim atteint un sommet historique en Haïti
results.description: Reports indicate that the hunger crisis in Haiti has reached unprecedented levels, raising alarms over food security and humanitarian needs.

results.headline: Inauguration du nouveau local de l'Ecole nationale mixte de Léogâne
results.description: The Ministry of National Education inaugurated a new facility for the Mixed National School in Léogâne, emphasizing improvements in educational infrastructure.

results.headline: Robotique : Deux prix pour Haïti au First Global Challenge 2024
results.description: A team of Haitian adolescents has excelled at the First Global Challenge 2024 in Greece, bringing home two prestigious awards in robotics, showcasing young talent.

results.headline: Lancement de l’année scolaire 2024-2025 à Port-au-Prince et dans les provinces
results.description: The new school year officially commenced, with various ministries announcing measures to enhance security and educational quality amidst challenges.
